chats.question: Rules
chats.answer:
1. Drink 3/4 glasses of water or water with syrup or juice !    
2. Max 1 coffe, 1 tea, 1 milk daily !    
---
3. No more screen time that 2hrs, other than coding or tutorials !  
---
4. Start coding by 7 !  
5. Code for 4 hrs daily !  
6. Tutorials for 1hr daily !  
---
7. No coding past 18:00 !  
8. No computers past 20:00 !  
9. No mobile phone past 22:00 !
---
10. Sleep 8 hrs, from 23:00 most late !  
---
11. Exercice daily !  
12. Walk at least weekly !  
---  
Put pass/fail daily for these points.

1. pass
2. pass  
---
3. fail
---
4. fail  
5. pass, 8 pomodoro  
6. pass, 2 pomodoro  
---
7. fail
8. fail  
9. fail
---  
10. fail  
---
11. fail  
12. fail
